alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:28PM CDT until May 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHOCTAW COUNTY... At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goodland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Soper... Goodland... Grant... Ord... Gay... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
